# coordinateSpace

**Instance Property**

The current coordinate space of the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var coordinateSpace: any UICoordinateSpace { get }
```

## Discussion

The screen’s current coordinate space always reflects any interface orientations applied to the device. Therefore, the bounds of this coordinate space match the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScreen/bounds] property of the screen itself.

## Getting the coordinate space

- **fixedCoordinateSpace**: The fixed coordinate space of the screen.
